title: email/account
body: how many accounts can i create with the same email account

replies.body:
Just one per region, but after you set up the account you can always switch the email to one you're using for another! Just log into the website with your account, mouse over your profile on the top of this page and go to **Settings**. There you'll find the option to change your associated email address.
